comment.body:
> [eventi](#comment_1_1DcDDitsjFJohvwonPmpibRChmA7uGxqL7): I had to install coffee-script (mac) and compile:
> npm -g install coffee-scriptcd js/coffee --compile --join all.js -- lib/ZeroFrame.coffee ZeroChat.coffee

Thanks this helped!
You should probably remove the "(coming soon)" text at the bottom.

CTRL + F: To make it work add a function to js/ZeroChat.coffe that displays the certificate selection dialog to user:

ZeroChat.coffe --> ZeroChat.coffee
